div.head: 痰氣結胸
div.div: bound chest because of phlegm qi

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: bound chest because of phlegm qi

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with xiao jie xiong 小結胸 , minor bound chest. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry yin zhu 銀硃 quoting Huo you xin shu 活幼心書 : 平常小兒，多有小結胸證 然陷胸湯內有黃連極 苦，難以施之。嬰孩如發表後，但用鶴頂丹為治 , “Children often have conditions of ‘minor bound chest’. Now, the ‘decoction sinking into the chest’ has huang lian as one of its ingredients. This is a very bitter [substance] and must not be administered. When a child manifests [minor bound chest], the only way to cure this is by means of the ‘crane’s neck elixir ’”, writes: 痰氣結胸：鶴頂丹： 不問陰陽虛實， ”For bound chest because of phlegm qi [use] the ‘crane’s neck elixir’. Regardless of whether [the disease] is of a yin or yang type, a depletion or repletion”.
